main - package main
 
Main - Class in main
This class is the main and it associate all the classes and algorithms needed to implement the blackjack game.

The main method.
makeBet(double, double) - Method in class blackjack.Game
This method receives a value b that is the quantity to bet and a min_bet that is the minimum bet.

Mode - Class in blackjack
This class implements an abstract class "Mode" that implements a common method for all the "child" classes.

This constructor gives a value to the three varibles.
